title: CI/ Integration for release
body: This PR will resolve the conflicts in order to be ready for release.

title: Feat/ Removed CI2.yml in main
body: This is just a file removal so it won't require a review

title: Request to Integrate Changes into the Parent Repository
body:
**Description:**  
Since integration is not working yet, we have accidentally overwritten your changes and your commits have been removed from the`develop` branch of the `salmorejo-hub/uvlhub` repository.
We kindly request your team to integrate your changes into the parent repository as soon as possible. This integration is crucial to proceed with an initial release and establish a first version of the project.

**Expected Result:**  
The parent repository should reflect the latest changes from your repository, enabling us to prepare the initial release.  

**Current Result:**  
The parent repository is missing updates from your repository, which delays the release process.

title: Feat/WI5 staging area Ref#5
body: Adding a new functinoality that allows the user to stage and unstage the different datasets in order to upload them to the public repository. This functionality isn't ready yet, as it is dependant on Zenodo (or Fakenodo) integration.

title: Feat/WI6 search queries Ref#6
body: This PR adds new search queries for Featured Models for the repository. Either go to Explore UVL tab or input a search on the header. The download of all files from the query that the issue specifies is not yet finished.

title: Fix: Solved error in test of auth for the WI
body: This PR aims to solve an error from the original repository where a selenium test would fail, now it's fixed and works as intended.

title: WI-2.6 Search Queries
body: As a user I want to be able to query the repo in a way that allows me to bring a set of models, or even download them all.

title: WI-2.5 Stagging Area
body: As a user, I want to be able to upload datasets to uvlhub and not put them into zenodo immediately but keep them in a kind of stage inside uvlhub so that I can edit them over time and when I want them to be permanent, then I can press a button that is "upload to fakenodo".

title: WI-2.4 Rate dataset/models
body: As a user, I want to be able to rate the datasets and/or feature models in the repo

title: WI-2.3 Improve UI
body:
Change the UI to make it more accessible, easier to navigate and show more useful info overall.

Suggestion: the way of listing the dataset content has to be as similar as possible to GitHub for the principle of usability predictability

title: WI-2.2 View user profile
body: As a user, I want to see displayed all their UVLs from an user in their user profile.

title: WI-2.1 Visualize UVL
body: As a user I want to be able to preview a UVL in text mode without having to download it.
